choices.text: Molly Hooper has n different kinds of chemicals arranged in a line. Each of the chemicals has an affection value, The i-th of them has affection value a_{i}. Molly wants Sherlock to fall in love with her. She intends to do this by mixing a contiguous segment of chemicals together to make a love potion with total affection value as a non-negative integer power of k. Total affection value of a continuous segment of chemicals is the sum of affection values of each chemical in that segment. Help her to do so in finding the total number of such segments.
